title: Client Crashes Immediately after Login
body: When i start up the launcher, I can log in fine, but once the actual client starts up, it just immediately crashes. I have Windows 10

replies.body:
Crashes after login can be caused by certain network settings that cause your client to drop its connection to our servers entirely. I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it commonly resolves these types of issues.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
